block.p: SHORE BANCSHARES INC., -- Centreville, Md., the holding company for Centreville National Bank of Maryland, agreed to buy Talbot Bancshares Inc., Easton, Md., for about $50.6 million in stock.
SHORE BANCSHARES INC., -- Centreville, Md., the holding company for Centreville National Bank of Maryland, agreed to buy Talbot Bancshares Inc., Easton, Md., for about $50.6 million in stock.
VISHAY INTERTECHNOLOGY INC., -- Malvern, Pa., a maker of transistors and other electronic components, said it was considering a stock repurchase and acquisitions.

TRITON ENERGY LTD., -- Dallas, an oil and gas exploration company, bought a 38 percent stake in a joint venture exploring for oil in fields of Gabon's Gulf of Guinea, off the coast of West Africa. Terms were not disclosed.

DANA CORP., -- Toledo, Ohio, the largest maker of light-truck axles, agreed to sell a Marion, Ohio, plant that makes forged metal heavy-truck parts to Sypris Solutions Inc., Louisville, Ky. The price was not disclosed.
